#summary Fetch information about a capability.
#labels Protocol-Capability

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetCapability||String||Yes||
||`CapabilityID`||UUID of the capability to fetch||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=GetCapability
&CapabilityID=c006082b-80eb-4d17-90ff-224412c574ea
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the capability was found, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`CapabilityID`||Same UUID that was passed in the request||UUID||
||`OwnerID`||UUID of the owner of this capability||UUID||
||`Resource`||Name of the protected resource this capability maps to||String||
||`Expiration`||UTC timestamp when this capability will expire||UTC Timestamp||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
    "CapabilityID":"c006082b-80eb-4d17-90ff-224412c574ea",
    "OwnerID":"efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0",
    "Resource":"login",
    "Expiration":1264451975,
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"Capability not found"
}
}}}
